oadm_off.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 //Filename    : OADM_OFF.CPP
00002 //Description : AdmOffice (Admissions and Financial Aid Office) class
00003 //Owner           : Kevin(ho)
00004 
00005 // Notes:       Steps to introduce a new class of user interface
00006 //                              1.      construct the new class
00007 //                              2.      in sys.h, add the new MODE, e.g. MODE_ADMISSIONS_AND_FINANCIAL_AID_OFFICE
00008 //                              3.      include the new header file in cc.cpp, osysdisp.cpp, osysdet.cpp
00009 //                              4.      in cc.cpp, declare a global object of the new class, with the name matching the 'extern' statement in the header file
00010 //                              5.      in osysdisp.cpp, under switch(view_mode), add the redirection to the display function
00011 //                              6.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::detect_view, add the redirection to the detect function
00012 //                              7.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::process_key, add the new hot key (optional)
00013 //                              8.      in osysdet.cpp, under Sys::detect_button, modify if necessary (see the comments there)
00014 //                              9.      the deinit function (AdmOffice::deinit()) can be called when the view_mode in 'sys' object is switched
00015 //                                      the function frees memory occupied by this object
00016 //                                      the report function would re-allocate memory when it is called (note the report_init_flag)
00017 //                                      notice the beginning section of Sys::disp_frame()
00018 // Norris 0714
00019

00349 //------- Begin of function AdmOffice::deinit ---------------//
00351 void AdmOffice::deinit() {
00352     //--------- deallocate memory -------------//
00353 
00354     // ##### begin Gilbert 28/04/2001 #####//
00355     bottom_button_group.deinit_buttons();
00356     // ##### end Gilbert 28/04/2001 #####//
00357     if (*bottom_button_up_bitmap) {
00358         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00359             mem_del(bottom_button_up_bitmap[i]);
00360             mem_del(bottom_button_down_bitmap[i]);
00361             bottom_button_up_bitmap[i] = NULL;
00362             bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] = NULL;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     (*deinit_func_ptr[current_mode])();
00367 
00368     report_init_flag = 0;
00369 }
00370 
00371 //--------- End of function AdmOffice::deinit ---------------//
00372 
00373 //------- Begin of function AdmOffice::init -----------------//
00375 void AdmOffice::init() {
00376     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00377         bottom_button_up_bitmap[i] = NULL;
00378         bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] = NULL;
00379     }
00380     current_mode = MODE_ADMISSION;
00381     sub_current_mode=0;
00382 }
00383 
00384 //--------- End of function AdmOffice::init -----------------//

00386 //------- Begin of function AdmOffice::report ---------------//
00388 void AdmOffice::report(int refreshFlag) {
00389     vga.use_back();
00390 
00391 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00392     // fix in version 2
00393     sys.is_institution_report = 1;
00394 #endif
00395 
00396     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00397         if( report_init_flag )                        // deinit it first if it has already been initialized
00398             deinit();
00399 
00400         //------------- paint the background ----------------//
00401         user_interface.bg_img(BG_PIC_ID, &vga_back);
00402 
00403         //----- initialize the bottom sub-menus buttons -----//
00404         if (!report_init_flag) {
00405             short x = BOTTOM_BUTTON_X1;
00406             for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++, x+=BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH+BOTTOM_BUTTON_DISTANCE) {
00407                 user_interface.create_button_bitmap(x, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1,
00408                                                     x+BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1+BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00409                                                     bottom_button_label[i], &bottom_button_up_bitmap[i],
00410                                                     &bottom_button_down_bitmap[i], &vga_back);
00411                 bottom_button_group[i].create_bitmapW(x, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1,
00412                                                       x+BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH, BOTTOM_BUTTON_Y1+BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
00413                                                       ((i == current_mode) ? bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] : bottom_button_up_bitmap[i])+4);
00414             }
00415             report_init_flag = 1;
00416         }
00417 
00418         //----------- paint the bottom button group ---------//
00419         bottom_button_group.paint(current_mode);
00420     }
00421 
00422     //---- repaint/refresh the display of the current mode ----//
00423     (*report_func_ptr[current_mode])(refreshFlag);
00424 
00425     // Comments:        blt buffer only if repaint, because the
00426     //                                  report_x functions would handle blt_buf
00427     //                                  when refresh
00428     //                                  equivalently, in the report_x functions,
00429     //                                  only blt buffer when refresh
00430     // Norris 0714
00431 
00432     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00433         //------- blt the back buffer to front buffer -------//
00434         vga.blt_buf(ZOOM_X1, ZOOM_Y1, ZOOM_X2, ZOOM_Y2);
00435     }
00436 
00437     //##trevor 2807
00438     vga.use_front();
00439     //##trevor 2807
00440 }
00441 
00442 //---------- End of function AdmOffice::report ------------//
00443 
00444 //-------- Begin of function AdmOffice::detect ------------//
00446 int AdmOffice::detect() {
00447     vga.use_back();
00448 
00449     int rc = detect2();
00450 
00451     vga.use_front();
00452 
00453     return rc;
00454 }
00455 
00456 //---------- End of function AdmOffice::detect ------------//
00457 
00458 //-------- Begin of function AdmOffice::detect2 ------------//
00462 int AdmOffice::detect2() {
00463     if (!report_init_flag)
00464         return 0;
00465 
00466     int bottomButtonGroupDetect;
00467     if ((bottomButtonGroupDetect = bottom_button_group.detect()) >= 0) {
00468         //---- deinit the modes to free memory ----//
00469         (*deinit_func_ptr[current_mode])();
00470 
00471         //-------- change display mode ------------//
00472         bottom_button_group[current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_up_bitmap[current_mode] + 4);
00473         current_mode = bottomButtonGroupDetect;
00474         bottom_button_group[current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_down_bitmap[current_mode] + 4);
00475 
00476         //-------- post display redraw flag -------//
00477         sys.redraw_all_flag = 1;
00478 
00479         return 1;
00480     }
00481 
00482     if ((*detect_func_ptr[current_mode])())
00483         return 1;
00484 
00485     return 0;
00486 }

00502 static void report_admission(int refreshFlag) {
00503     // begin Kevin 0716
00504 
00505     //temp * start
00506     static int ar_tug=10,yr_tug=24;
00507     static int ar_ug=20,yr_ug=42;
00508     static int ar_master=15,yr_master=23;
00509     static int ar_doc=12,yr_doc=23;
00510     static int ar_dist=12,yr_dist=23;
00511     static int bar[5][3];
00512 
00513     // ##### Begin Marco ##### //
00514 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00515     static int initial_ar_tug=10,initial_yr_tug=24;
00516     static int initial_ar_ug=20,initial_yr_ug=42;
00517     static int initial_ar_master=15,initial_yr_master=23;
00518     static int initial_ar_doc=12,initial_yr_doc=23;
00519     static int initial_ar_dist=12,initial_yr_dist=23;
00520 #endif
00521     // ##### End Marco ###### //
00522 
00523     // top title
00524     user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+150,REPORT_Y1-18,REPORT_X1+575,REPORT_Y1+5);
00525     user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+150,REPORT_Y1-18,REPORT_X1+575,REPORT_Y1+5,1);
00526     font_charts.put(REPORT_X1+220,REPORT_Y1-12,"Student Admissions Statistics and Targets");
00527 
00528     //  Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
00529     ar_tug=(int)(100*enroll_res.offers_rate[0]);
00530     yr_tug=(int)(100*enroll_res.cur_yield_rate[0]);
00531     ar_ug=(int)(100*enroll_res.offers_rate[1]);
00532     yr_ug=(int)(100*enroll_res.cur_yield_rate[1]);
00533     ar_master=(int)(100*enroll_res.offers_rate[2]);
00534     yr_master=(int)(100*enroll_res.cur_yield_rate[2]);
00535     ar_doc=(int)(100*enroll_res.offers_rate[3]);
00536     yr_doc=(int)(100*enroll_res.cur_yield_rate[3]);
00537     ar_dist=(int)(100*enroll_res.offers_rate[4]);
00538     yr_dist=(int)(100*enroll_res.cur_yield_rate[4]);
00539 
00540     // ##### Begin Marco ##### //
00541 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00542     initial_ar_tug=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_offers_rate[0]);
00543     initial_yr_tug=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_cur_yield_rate[0]);
00544     initial_ar_ug=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_offers_rate[1]);
00545     initial_yr_ug=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_cur_yield_rate[1]);
00546     initial_ar_master=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_offers_rate[2]);
00547     initial_yr_master=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_cur_yield_rate[2]);
00548     initial_ar_doc=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_offers_rate[3]);
00549     initial_yr_doc=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_cur_yield_rate[3]);
00550     initial_ar_dist=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_offers_rate[4]);
00551     initial_yr_dist=(int)(100*enroll_res.initial_cur_yield_rate[4]);
00552 #endif
00553     // ##### End Marco ##### //
00554 
00555     bar[0][0]=enroll_res.total_matrics[UG_TRADITION];
00556     bar[1][0]=enroll_res.total_matrics[UG_NONTRADITION];
00557     bar[2][0]=enroll_res.total_matrics[MASTER];
00558     bar[3][0]=enroll_res.total_matrics[DOCTOR];

01387 #define HISTORY_GRAPH_COUNT HISTORY_GRAPH_COUNT_GENERAL
01388 
01389 //-------- Begin of function report_statistics ------------//
01391 static void report_statistics(int refreshFlag) {
01392     //  Begin - Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
01393     static int  numSeriesData = HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
01394 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01395     static int  numSeriesData2 = HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT;
01396 #endif
01397     static int  *dataArray[HISTORY_GRAPH_COUNT];
01398 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01399     static int dataArray2[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT];
01400 #endif
01401     static int  xStart,xEnd;
01402 
01403   // top title
01404     user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-23,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1);
01405     user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-23,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1,1);
01406     font_charts.put(REPORT_X1+270,REPORT_Y1-17,"Quality and Selectivity Trends");
01407 
01408     user_interface.darken(  MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1-50,REPORT_Y2-54,
01409                             MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1+600,REPORT_Y2+6);
01410     user_interface.brighten(  MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1-50,REPORT_Y2-54,
01411                               MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1+600,REPORT_Y2+6);
01412     user_interface.rect(  MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1-50,REPORT_Y2-54,
01413                           MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1+600,REPORT_Y2+6,1);
01414 
01415     // Starting year
01416     xStart = info.game_year-numSeriesData+1;
01417     xEnd = info.game_year;
01418 
01419 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01420     dataArray[0]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_CREDITS_DEMANDED];
01421     for ( int i=0; i<HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT; i++ )
01422         dataArray2[i]=enroll_res.distance_credits_provided_history[i];
01423 #else
01424     dataArray[0]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_OFFERS_RATE];
01425     dataArray[1]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_YIELD_RATE];
01426 #endif
01427     dataArray[2]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_ACADEMIC];
01428     dataArray[3]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_PERCENT_MINORITY];
01429     dataArray[4]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_EXTRACURRICULAR];
01430     dataArray[5]=enroll_res.matric_history[adm_office.sub_current_mode][ER_ATHLETICS];
01431 
01432     //  End - Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
01433 
01434     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
01435         if (mode_init_flag != MODE_STATISTICS) {
01436             //--------- initialization of the graphs -----------//
01437 
01438             // Notes:   graph settings
01439             //                          - no legend
01440             //                          - no axis labels
01441             //                          - transparent
01442             //                          - display most updated value
01443             //                          - number format 3 - percentage
01444 
01445             if(adm_office.sub_current_mode==0) {
01446 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01447                 mode_statistics_graph_admit_rate.init(
01448                     REPORT_X1,
01449                     REPORT_Y1+5,
01450                     REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH,
01451                     REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+5,
01452                     1, &numSeriesData, dataArray[0], 0,     /*temp*/
01453                     NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, 1, 1, 1);

01455                     REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,
01456                     REPORT_Y1+5,
01457                     REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH*2+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,
01458                     REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+5,
01459                     1, &numSeriesData2, dataArray2, 0,
01460                     NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, 1, 1);
01461 #else

01468                     NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, 1, 1, 3);

01474                     1, &numSeriesData, dataArray[1], 0,     /*temp*/
01475                     NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, 1, 1, 3);
01476 #endif

01501                     REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH*3+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE*2,

01551                     x, MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1,
01552                     x+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH+105,

01556                     &sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i], &vga_back);

01558                     x, MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1,
01559                     x+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH+105,
01560                     MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
01561                     ((i == adm_office.sub_current_mode) ?
01562                      sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] :
01563                      sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap[i])+4);
01564             }
01565             for (i = 2,x = MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_X1-35; i < 5; i++, x+=SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_DISTANCE) {
01566                 user_interface.create_button_bitmap(
01567                     x, MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1+26,
01568                     x+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01569                     MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT+26,
01570                     sub_bottom_button_label[i],
01571                     &sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap[i],
01572                     &sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i], &vga_back);
01573                 sub_bottom_button_group[i].create_bitmapW(
01574                     x, MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1+26,
01575                     x+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01576                     MODE_STATISTICS_SUB_BUTTON_Y1+SUB_BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT+26,
01577                     ((i == adm_office.sub_current_mode) ?
01578                      sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] :
01579                      sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap[i])+4);
01580             }
01581         }
01582         //----------- paint the bottom button group ---------//
01583 
01584         sub_bottom_button_group.paint(adm_office.sub_current_mode);
01585 
01586         //-------- repaint the graphs -----------//
01587         for (int i = 0; i < ((adm_office.sub_current_mode==0)?6:3); i++) {

01589             // skip the graph when i == 1; replace by another graph
01590             if ( i == 1 )
01591                 continue;
01592 #endif
01593             mode_statistics_graph[i]->paint();
01594         }
01595 
01596 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01597         distance_credits_graph.paint();
01598 #endif
01599 
01600         //-------- draw the graph title ---------//
01601         if(adm_office.sub_current_mode==0)
01602             for (i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
01603                 font_chartsm.put_paragraph(
01604                     REPORT_X1+(i%3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE),
01605                     REPORT_Y1+(i/3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+7,
01606                     REPORT_X1+(i%3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+30,
01607                     REPORT_Y1+(i/3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+7+3*font_chartsm.max_font_height,
01608                     mode_statistics_graph_title[i]);
01609             }
01610         else
01611             for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01612                 font_chartsm.put_paragraph(
01613                     REPORT_X1+(i%3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE),
01614                     REPORT_Y1+(i/3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+72,
01615                     REPORT_X1+(i%3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH,
01616                     REPORT_Y1+(i/3)*(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE)+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+72+3*font_chartsm.max_font_height,
01617                     mode_statistics_graph_title[i]);
01618             }
01619     }
01620     else {                                          // refreshFlag == INFO_REFRESH
01621         //---------- refresh the graphs -----------//
01622         for (int i = 0; i < ((adm_office.sub_current_mode==0)?6:3); i++) {
01623 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01624             if ( i == 1 )
01625                 continue;
01626 #endif
01627             mode_statistics_graph[i]->refresh();
01628         }
01629 
01630 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01631         distance_credits_graph.refresh();
01632 #endif
01633 
01634         if(adm_office.sub_current_mode==0) {
01635             vga.blt_buf(
01636                 REPORT_X1,
01637                 REPORT_Y1+5,
01638                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH,
01639                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+5);
01640             vga.blt_buf(
01641                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,
01642                 REPORT_Y1+5,
01643                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH*2+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,
01644                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+5);
01645             vga.blt_buf(
01646                 REPORT_X1+(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE)*2,
01647                 REPORT_Y1+5,
01648                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH*3+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE*2,
01649                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+5);
01650             vga.blt_buf(
01651                 REPORT_X1,
01652                 REPORT_Y1+5+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE,
01653                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH,
01654                 REPORT_Y1+5+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT*2+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_VERTICAL_DISTANCE);
01655 
01656             vga.blt_buf(
01657                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,

01659                 REPORT_X1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH*2+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE,

01670                 REPORT_X1,

01678                 REPORT_Y1+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HEIGHT+70);
01679             vga.blt_buf(
01680                 REPORT_X1+(MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_WIDTH+MODE_STATISTICS_GRAPH_HORIZONTAL_DISTANCE)*2,

01685     }
01686 
01687     //&&
01688 }

01692 //-------- Begin of function report_priority --------------//
01694 static void report_priority(int refreshFlag) {
01695 
01696     //*** temporary ***//
01697     static int sliderVar1 = 8, sliderVar2 = 7, sliderVar3 = 3, sliderVar4 = 4;
01698     static int radioVar1 = 1, radioVar2 = 1;        //*** temporary ***//
01699 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01700     static int radioVar3 = 1;
01701 #endif
01702 
01703     // top title
01704     user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-23,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1);
01705     user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-23,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1,1);
01706     font_charts.put(REPORT_X1+265,REPORT_Y1-17,"Admissions Priorities");
01707 
01708     //  Begin - Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
01709     sliderVar1  = (int)enroll_res.offers_priority[0]*1000;
01710     sliderVar2  = (int)enroll_res.offers_priority[1]*1000;
01711     sliderVar3  = (int)enroll_res.offers_priority[2]*1000;
01712     //  sliderVar4      = (int)enroll_res.offers_priority[2];
01713     radioVar1 = enroll_res.minority_offers_special;
01714     radioVar2 = enroll_res.athlete_offers_special;
01715 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01716     radioVar3 = enroll_res.distance_learner_acceptance;
01717 #endif
01718     //  End - Communicate with Sim Engine's Output
01719 
01720     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
01721         //--------- draw the brightened boxes ------------//
01722         user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+5, REPORT_Y1+5, REPORT_X2-3, REPORT_Y1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT-3);
01723         user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+5, REPORT_Y2+5-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT, REPORT_X2-3, REPORT_Y2-3);
01724         user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+5, REPORT_Y1+5, REPORT_X2-3, REPORT_Y1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT-3);
01725         user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+5, REPORT_Y2+5-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT, REPORT_X2-3, REPORT_Y2-3);
01726 
01727         if (mode_init_flag != MODE_PRIORITY) {
01728             mode_init_flag = MODE_PRIORITY;
01729             //--------- initialize the sliders ---------------//
01730             mode_priority_value_slider_academic_rating.init(
01731                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB2,
01732                 REPORT_Y1+40,
01733                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_WIDTH,
01734                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_HEIGHT,
01735                 0, 10000, &sliderVar1, 1, V_YELLOW, 9);
01736 
01737             mode_priority_value_slider_extracur_rating.init(
01738                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB2,
01739                 REPORT_Y1+80,
01740                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_WIDTH,
01741                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_HEIGHT,
01742                 0, 10000, &sliderVar2, 1, V_YELLOW, 9);
01743 
01744             mode_priority_value_slider_athletic_rating.init(
01745                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB2,
01746                 REPORT_Y1+120,
01747                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_WIDTH,
01748                 MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_HEIGHT,
01749                 0, 10000, &sliderVar3, 1, V_YELLOW, 9);
01750 
01751             //                  mode_priority_value_slider_distance_learning.init(
01752             //                          REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB2,
01753             //                          REPORT_Y1+120,
01754             //                          MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_WIDTH,
01755             //                          MODE_PRIORITY_VALUE_SLIDER_HEIGHT,
01756             //                          0, 10, &sliderVar4, 1, V_YELLOW, 4);
01757 
01758             //--------- initialize the radio buttons ---------------//
01759 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01760             mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.init(
01761                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3,
01762                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+35,
01763                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01764                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+65,
01765                 (news_event_function_array[NEWS_COURT_LIMIT_MINORITY-1].odd_chance == 0)?2:3,
01766                 &radioVar1, mode_priority_radio_button_option_str);
01767 
01768             mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.init(
01769                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3,
01770                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+85,
01771                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01772                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+115,
01773                 3, &radioVar2, mode_priority_radio_button_option_str);
01774 
01775             mode_priority_radio_button_distance_learners.init(
01776                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3,
01777                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+130,
01778                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01779                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+160,
01780                 3, &radioVar3, mode_priority_radio_button_option_str1);
01781 #else
01782             mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.init(
01783                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3,
01784                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+45,

01786                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+75,

01788                 &radioVar1, mode_priority_radio_button_option_str);
01789 
01790             mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.init(
01791                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3,
01792                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+110,
01793                 REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
01794                 REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+140,
01795                 3, &radioVar2, mode_priority_radio_button_option_str);
01796 #endif
01797         }
01798         else {
01799             // repaint
01800             mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.paint();
01801             mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.paint();
01802 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01803             mode_priority_radio_button_distance_learners.paint();
01804 #endif
01805             mode_priority_value_slider_academic_rating.paint();
01806             mode_priority_value_slider_extracur_rating.paint();
01807             mode_priority_value_slider_athletic_rating.paint();
01808             //                  mode_priority_value_slider_distance_learning.paint();
01809         }
01810         // display the text
01811         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+42,mode_priority_str[1]);
01812         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+82,mode_priority_str[2]);

01814 
01815         //              font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+122,mode_priority_str[4]);
01816         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y2-145,mode_priority_str[5]);
01817         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y2-95,mode_priority_str[6]);
01818         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1+190,REPORT_Y1+15,mode_priority_str[7]);
01819 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01820         font_chartsm.put(REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y2-50,mode_priority_str[8]);
01821 #endif
01822     }
01823     else {                                          // refreshFlag == INFO_REFRESH
01824 
01825         mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.refresh();
01826         mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.refresh();
01827 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01828         mode_priority_radio_button_distance_learners.refresh();
01829 #endif

01831         mode_priority_value_slider_extracur_rating.refresh();
01832         mode_priority_value_slider_athletic_rating.refresh();
01833         //              mode_priority_value_slider_distance_learning.refresh();
01834 
01835     }

01958 //-------- Begin of function detect_admission ---------//
01960 static int detect_admission() {
01961     help.set_help(
01962         REPORT_X1+110,
01963         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW1-10,
01964         REPORT_X1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH2,
01965         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW1+40,
01966         "H4.1.1.");
01967     help.set_help(
01968         REPORT_X1+110,
01969         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW2-15,
01970         REPORT_X1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH2,
01971         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW2+35,
01972         "H4.1.2.");
01973     help.set_help(
01974         REPORT_X1+110,
01975         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW3-5,
01976         REPORT_X1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH2,
01977         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW3+45,
01978         "H4.1.3.");
01979 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01980 #else
01981     help.set_help(
01982         REPORT_X1+110,
01983         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW5-5,
01984         REPORT_X1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH1+MODE_ADMISSION_BOX_WIDTH2,
01985         REPORT_Y1+MODE_ADMISSION_BARCHART_ROW5+45,
01986         "H4.1.4.");
01987 #endif
01988 
01989 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01990     for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
01991         if(i!=3)
01992             if(mode_admission_target[i].detect()) {
01993                 enroll_res.target_enrollment[i]=(*mode_admission_target[i].var_ptr);
01994                 //                              double tmp_total=enroll_res.total_matrics[i]+enroll_res.total_offers[i]+enroll_res.total_applications[i];
01995                 //                              if(tmp_total>1e-5)
01996                 //                                      enroll_res.target_student_intake_ratio[i]=((double)enroll_res.target_student_intake[i])/(tmp_total);
01997             }
01998 #else
01999     for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
02000         if(i!=3)
02001             if(mode_admission_target[i].detect()) {
02002                 enroll_res.target_student_intake[i]=(*mode_admission_target[i].var_ptr);
02003                 double tmp_total=enroll_res.total_matrics[i]+enroll_res.total_offers[i]+enroll_res.total_applications[i];
02004                 if(tmp_total>1e-5)
02005                     enroll_res.target_student_intake_ratio[i]=((double)enroll_res.target_student_intake[i])/(tmp_total);
02006             }
02007 #endif
02008     return 0;
02009 }

02013 //-------- Begin of function detect_statistics ---------//
02015 static int detect_statistics() {
02016     vga.use_front();
02017     int bottomButtonGroupDetect;
02018     if ((bottomButtonGroupDetect = sub_bottom_button_group.detect()) >= 0) {
02019         //-------- change display mode ------------//
02020         sub_bottom_button_group[adm_office.current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_up_bitmap[adm_office.current_mode] + 4);
02021         adm_office.sub_current_mode = bottomButtonGroupDetect;
02022         sub_bottom_button_group[adm_office.current_mode].body_ptr = (void *) (bottom_button_down_bitmap[adm_office.current_mode] + 4);
02023         //-------- post display redraw flag -------//
02024         sys.redraw_all_flag = 1;
02025         return 1;
02026     }
02027     return 0;
02028 }

02032 //-------- Begin of function detect_priority ---------//
02034 static int detect_priority() {
02035     if (mode_init_flag != MODE_PRIORITY)
02036         return 0;
02037 
02038     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+42,
02039                     REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1+600,REPORT_Y1+80,"H4.2.1.");
02040     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+82,
02041                     REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1+600,REPORT_Y1+120,"H4.2.2.");
02042     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,REPORT_Y1+122,
02043                     REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1+600,REPORT_Y1+160,"H4.2.3.");
02044 
02045     help.set_help(
02046         REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,
02047         REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+25,
02048         REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
02049         REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+85,
02050         "H4.2.4.");
02051 
02052     help.set_help(
02053         REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB1,
02054         REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+90,
02055         REPORT_X1+MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_TAB3+MODE_PRIORITY_RADIO_BUTTON_WIDTH,
02056         REPORT_Y2-MODE_PRIORITY_BOX_HEIGHT+150,
02057         "H4.2.5.");
02058 
02059     if (mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.detect()) {
02060         //--- Special handling: chance card Court Limit Preferences based on Race ---//
02061 
02062         if( chance_event.court_limit_minority_flag ) {
02063             box.msg( "You cannot set this to high as courts ban favoring admission and financial aid on the basis of race or ethnicity." );
02064 
02065             //---- do not allow pressing the "High" button ----//
02066 
02067             if( *(mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.sel_num) == INPUT_HIGH ) {
02068                 *(mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.sel_num) = INPUT_MEDIUM;
02069                 mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.refresh();
02070             }
02071         }
02072 
02073         enroll_res.minority_offers_special=*(mode_priority_radio_button_minorities.sel_num);;
02074         return 1;
02075     }
02076 
02077     if (mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.detect()) {
02078         enroll_res.athlete_offers_special=*(mode_priority_radio_button_athletes.sel_num);
02079         return 1;
02080     }
02081 
02082 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
02083     if (mode_priority_radio_button_distance_learners.detect()) {
02084         enroll_res.distance_learner_acceptance=*(mode_priority_radio_button_distance_learners.sel_num);
02085         return 1;
02086     }
02087 #endif
02088 
02089     if (mode_priority_value_slider_academic_rating.detect()) {
02090         enroll_res.offers_priority[0]=(int)(*(mode_priority_value_slider_academic_rating.var_ptr)/1000);
02091         return 1;
02092     }
02093     if (mode_priority_value_slider_extracur_rating.detect()) {
02094         enroll_res.offers_priority[1]=(int)(*(mode_priority_value_slider_extracur_rating.var_ptr)/1000);
02095         return 1;
02096     }
02097 
02098     if (mode_priority_value_slider_athletic_rating.detect()) {
02099         enroll_res.offers_priority[2]=(int)(*(mode_priority_value_slider_athletic_rating.var_ptr)/1000);
02100         return 1;
02101     }
02102 
02103     //  if (mode_priority_value_slider_distance_learning.detect())
02104     //  {       enroll_res.offers_priority[2]=*(mode_priority_value_slider_distance_learning.var_ptr);
02105     //          return 1;
02106     //  }
02107 
02108     return 0;
02109 }
02110

02113 //-------- Begin of function detect_financial_aid ---------//
02115 static int detect_financial_aid() {
02116     if (mode_init_flag != MODE_FINANCIAL_AID)
02117         return 0;
02118 
02119     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+30,
02120                     REPORT_Y1+33,
02121                     REPORT_X2-15,
02122                     REPORT_Y1+65,"H4.3.1.");
02123     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+30,
02124                     REPORT_Y1+66,
02125                     REPORT_X2-15,
02126                     REPORT_Y1+98,"H4.3.2.");
02127     help.set_help(  REPORT_X1+30,
02128                     REPORT_Y1+MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1+MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_DISTANCE+(MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_2/4)*2-15,
02129                     REPORT_X2-15,
02130                     REPORT_Y1+MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1+MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_DISTANCE+(MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_2/4)*2+35,
02131                     "H4.3.3.");
02132 
02133     help.set_help(
02134         REPORT_X1+30,
02135         REPORT_Y2-MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1-15,
02136         REPORT_X2-15,
02137         REPORT_Y2-MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1+35,
02138         "H4.3.4.");
02139 
02140     help.set_help(
02141         REPORT_X1+30,
02142         REPORT_Y2-MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1+35,
02143         REPORT_X2-15,
02144         REPORT_Y2-MODE_FINANCIAL_AID_BOX_HEIGHT_1+85,
02145         "H4.3.5.");
02146 
02147     if(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_nontraditional.detect()) {
02148         enroll_res.fraction_sl2_offered_aid=((float)*(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_nontraditional.var_ptr))/(float)100.0;
02149         return 1;
02150     }
02151 
02152     if(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_need.detect()) {
02153         enroll_res.fraction_need_covered=((float)*(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_need.var_ptr))/(float)100.0;
02154         return 1;
02155     }
02156 
02157     if(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_minorities.detect()) {
02158         //--- Special handling: chance card Court Limit Preferences based on Race ---//
02159 
02160         if( chance_event.court_limit_minority_flag ) {
02161             //---- do not allow pressing the "High" button ----//
02162 
02163             if( *(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_minorities.sel_num) == INPUT_HIGH ) {
02164                 box.msg( "You cannot set this to high as courts ban favoring admission and financial aid on the basis of race or ethnicity." );
02165 
02166                 *(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_minorities.sel_num) = INPUT_MEDIUM;
02167                 mode_financial_aid_radio_button_minorities.refresh();
02168             }
02169         }
02170 
02171         //---------------------------------------------------//
02172 
02173         enroll_res.minority_aid_special=*(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_minorities.sel_num);
02174         return 1;
02175     }
02176 
02177     if(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_athletes.detect()) {
02178         enroll_res.athlete_aid_special=*(mode_financial_aid_radio_button_athletes.sel_num);
02179         return 1;
02180     }
02181 
02182     if(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_merit.detect()) {
02183         enroll_res.fraction_sl1_offered_merit_aid=(*(mode_financial_aid_value_slider_merit.var_ptr))/(float)100.0;
02184         return 1;
02185     }
02186 
02187     return 0;
02188 }

02194 static void deinit_admission() {
02195     if (mode_init_flag == MODE_ADMISSION) {
02196         if(mode_admission_no_scaling_bitmap) {
02197             mem_del(mode_admission_no_scaling_bitmap);
02198             mode_admission_no_scaling_bitmap=NULL;
02199         }
02200         for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
02201             if(mode_admission_no_ar_bitmap[i]) {
02202                 mem_del(mode_admission_no_ar_bitmap[i]);
02203                 mode_admission_no_ar_bitmap[i]=NULL;
02204             }
02205             if(mode_admission_no_yr_bitmap[i]) {
02206                 mem_del(mode_admission_no_yr_bitmap[i]);
02207                 mode_admission_no_yr_bitmap[i]=NULL;
02208             }
02209             if(mode_admission_no_bar_bitmap[i]) {
02210                 mem_del(mode_admission_no_bar_bitmap[i]);
02211                 mode_admission_no_bar_bitmap[i]=NULL;
02212             }
02213         }
02214         for(i=0;i<5;i++)
02215             if(i!=3)
02216                 mode_admission_target[i].deinit();
02217 
02218         // reset flag
02219         mode_init_flag = -1;
02220     }
02221 }

02225 //-------- Begin of function deinit_statistics ---------//
02227 static void deinit_statistics() {
02228     if (mode_init_flag == MODE_STATISTICS) {
02229         // deallocate memory used by the graphs
02230         for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
02231             mode_statistics_graph[i]->deinit();
02232         }
02233         // ##### begin Gilbert 28/04/2001 ####//
02234         sub_bottom_button_group.deinit_buttons();
02235         // ##### end Gilbert 28/04/2001 ####//
02236         if (*sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap) {
02237             for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
02238                 mem_del(sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap[i]);
02239                 mem_del(sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i]);
02240                 sub_bottom_button_up_bitmap[i] = NULL;
02241                 sub_bottom_button_down_bitmap[i] = NULL;
02242             }
02243         }
02244         // reset flag
02245         mode_init_flag = -1;
02246     }
02247 }
